/* use.selectCorpProductUnit */ SELECT A.SMART_CH_PRODUCT_YN , (SELECT CH_NAME FROM cm_console.CM_CH_INFO WHERE A.CH = CH) AS CH_NAME , A.CH , A.PRODUCT_CODE , A.PRODUCT_NAME
, B.PRE_FEE AS PREE_FEE , B.POST_FEE_INFO AS TOBE_FEE_INFO
, A.PRE_FEE AS PREE_FEE , A.POST_FEE_INFO AS TOBE_FEE_INFO
FROM cm_bo.CM_PRODUCT_UNIT A
INNER JOIN cm_console.CM_CORP_PRODUCT_UNIT B ON A.PRODUCT_CODE = B.PRODUCT_CODE
WHERE 1=1
AND B.CORP_ID = #{corpId}
ORDER BY PRODUCT_CODE

/* use.selectSixMonthUseCnt 6개월간 이용건수 조회 */ SELECT DATE_FORMAT(YM, '%Y%m') AS YM , SUM(SUCC_CNT) AS CNT FROM cm.CM_STAT_CH_MONTH WHERE CORP_ID = #{corpId} AND DATE_FORMAT(YM, '%Y%m') /* 최근 6개월 */ BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -6 MONTH), '%Y%m') AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH), '%Y%m') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(YM, '%Y%m')

/* use.selectSixMonthChanUseCnt 6개월간 채널별 이용건수 조회 */ SELECT CH , SUM(SUCC_CNT) AS CNT FROM cm.CM_STAT_CH_MONTH WHERE CORP_ID = #{corpId} AND DATE_FORMAT(YM, '%Y%m') /* 최근 6개월 */ BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -6 MONTH), '%Y%m') AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH), '%Y%m') GROUP BY CH

/* use.selectSixMonthPrePayAmt 최근 6개월간 선불결제금액 조회 */ SELECT DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m') AS PAY_MONTH , COUNT(*) AS PAY_CNT , SUM(CASH_CHARG_AMOUNT) AS PREPAYMENT_AMOUNT FROM cm_console.CM_WEB_CASH_HIST WHERE CORP_ID = #{corpId} AND DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y%m') /* 최근 6개월 */ BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -6 MONTH), '%Y%m') AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH), '%Y%m') AND STATUS = '1' GROUP BY PAY_MONTH

/* use.selectSixMonthDefPayAmt 최근 6개월간 후불청구금액 조회 */ SELECT A.YM , A.BILL_AMOUNT , B.PREPAYMENT_AMOUNT , A.VAT FROM ( /* 청구금액 */ SELECT CONCAT_WS('-', SUBSTR(YM, 1, 4) , SUBSTR(YM, 5, 2)) AS YM , SUM(CALC_AMOUNT) AS BILL_AMOUNT , SUM(CALC_AMOUNT) * 0.1 AS VAT FROM cm_console.CM_CAL_HIST WHERE CORP_ID = #{corpId} AND YM BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -6 MONTH), '%Y%m') AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH), '%Y%m') GROUP BY YM ) A, ( /* 이용금액 (선물결제금액) */ SELECT DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m') AS PAY_MONTH , SUM(CASH_CHARG_AMOUNT) AS PREPAYMENT_AMOUNT FROM cm_console.CM_WEB_CASH_HIST WHERE CORP_ID = #{corpId} AND DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y%m') /* 최근 6개월 */ BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -6 MONTH), '%Y%m') AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH), '%Y%m') AND STATUS = '1' GROUP BY PAY_MONTH ) B WHERE A.YM = B.PAY_MONTH
